text: visvasiccavare, keallappetunnavarute karyattil ‎pratikriya ninnalkk niyamamakkiyirikkunnu: ‎svatantran svatantran; atimakk atima; strikk stri. ‎ennal kealayalikk tanre saheadaranilninn ‎ilavu labhikkukayanenkil maryada paliyil atam ‎gikarikkukayum man'yamaya nastapariharam nalkukayum ‎venam. ninnalute nathanil ninnulla orilavum ‎karunyavumanit. pinneyum paridhi vitunnavarkk ‎neaveriya siksayunt. ‎
